name: SNS000... Chapter 0
description:
After a while the entity stopped talking, something, have changed...

movement = w a s d

arrow keys = move through dialogue

space = handbrake/jump

interact = e

go back/get out = q

crouch = ctrl

use = left mouse

enter = skip intro/choose

esc = exit game

... = Stare
